table.name: Jeweler
intro: This table can be used as inspiration or quick one-liners for a mod like Token Says.
outro: This table should be read or modified prior to using, to insert your own plot hooks.
table.caption: Jeweler Says
rows: Hi. I'm the town jeweler.
First I have to envision the piece I want to craft. Then I do a lot of bending, smithing, and gemcutting, and voila! Jewelry!
Gold and silver jewelry is probably the most requested jewelry I get.
I might be interested in buying any jewelled relics you find.
Gold is rare, but its value is an abstract construct of the monarchy. Oops. Forget I said that.
Behold the luster of this little pearl, as perfect as nature allows.
Pray, examine the fine craftsmanship of this brooch.
This ring befits a hand of regal blood.
Every jewel tells a tale; let me unlock its story.
How may I serve thee today, good adventurer?
I assure thee, the quality of my jewels is unsurpassed.
Take care with this piece, for it is as delicate as it is beautiful.

table.caption: Clockmaker Says
rows: Hello. I'm the town clockmaker.
The gears must align precisely, lest the mechanism falter.
Patience, for time itself is crafted here.
Bear witness to the dance of the pendulum, constant and true.
I shall need the finest metals to ensure the longevity of thy timepiece.
Mark the time well, for it waits for no one.
As the sands in the hourglass, so are the days of Galthour.
The balance gear must be free of imperfection, as Galthour orbits its twin suns.
Wouldst thou prefer a striking hour or a silent keeper of time?
How may I serve thee today, good adventurer?
Pray, give me time, and I will give thee a masterpiece.
Every cog and wheel must play its part, just as we do in life.

table.caption: Gunmaker Says
rows: Hello. I'm the town gunmaker.
Care to test the mettle of this fine arquebus?
A well-crafted barrel ensures the bullet flies true.
Each piece is forged with precision for assured reliability.
Keep thy powder dry and thy aim steady.
Let me show thee the proper care of thy firearm to prevent misfires.
This firearm is not just a tool; it is a companion in battle.
Wouldst thou prefer a wheel lock or a flintlock?
A good gunsmith listens to the gun as much as the customer.
This gun's range and accuracy are unmatched by any other in the land.
I can engrave it with thy crest for a personal touch.
Behold the craftsmanship that turns iron and wood into thunder and lightning.
